label: Tools
info: Tools for working with node-red and the data layer.

name: Parse message topic
Resetting files and indices
Parse message payload
Parsing data
Setting global config
Input filename
Add reset params
info:
Links going to the 'Low Data Rates' and 'High 
Data Rates' nodes are used to flush the node 
buffers. The link going to the 'trigger & block'
node resets the node that is responsible for
writing the data headers to the file.

name: Archiving files
Using InfluxDB?

Saving image to file and format metadata
info: Images are saved to files as they are received from the experiment. A flow-level variable is incremented each save to ensure unique file names.
